nodes.text: Jyn N'oram was a female Human who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Jyn N'oram worked for Hedrett Shipping and Investments as the Captain of the Fricasseed Nerf, a YT-1300 light freighter. During the Clone Wars, she was aboard the ship when it collided with a comet fragment in the Cularin system and was left drifting in space. However, she and the rest of the crew of the Nerf were rescued by the Heroes of Cularin.
